fields.title: Products  - Requirements link
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_note AS "Product note",
       r.requirement_id AS "Requirement UID",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       r.requirement_note AS "Requirement note",
       r.requirement_dissemination AS "Dissemination",
       r.requirement_quality_control_procedure AS "Requirement Quality Control Procedure",
       r.requirement_group AS "Requirement group",
 	   r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_goal AS "Requirement Uncertainty Goal",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_breakthrough AS "Requirement Update Frequency Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_goal AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_timeliness_threshold AS "Requirement Timeliness Threshold",
       r.requirement_timeliness_breakthrough AS "Requirement Timeliness Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_timeliness_goal AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",        
       pr.productrequirement_level_of_definition AS "Level of definition",
       pr.product_relevance AS "Relevance",
       pr.productrequirement_criticality AS "Criticality",
       dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance AS "Level of Compliance",
       r.requirement_state AS "State",
       r.requirement_owner AS "Owner",
       pr.productrequirement_note AS "Product requirement link note",
       pr.productrequirement_barrier AS "Barrier"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
ORDER BY UPPER(p.product_copernicus_service);
fields.description:
Use cases:
 1. List Requirements per given Product, Component, or Service
 2. List Requirements classified according to criticality per given Product, Component, or Service (filter by Criticality)
 3. List barriers per Product, Component, or Service
 4. List requirements with level_of_compliance different from “fully compliant” per given Service
5.  List main outstanding gaps per Service, Product, and Component ( by level of compliance)
6.  List  Requirements per given Product
7.  List Requirements with level_of_compliance “none” or “partially fullfilled” per given Service Component
8.  List Essential Requirements per given Product, Component, or Service (filter by Criticality)
9.  List Requirements per given Product, Component, or Service that are essential and not fulfilled (filter by Criticality and Level of Compliance)

fields.title: Products - Data  link
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       p.product_id AS "Product UID",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_area AS "Product area",
       d.data_id AS "Data UID",
       d.data_name AS "Data name",
       d.data_area AS "Data area",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Information costs",
       dr.datarequirement_handling_costs AS "Handling costs"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
ORDER BY UPPER(p.product_copernicus_service);
fields.description:
Use cases:
1.  List Data  per given Product, Component, or Service
2.  List Data used by a given Product, Component, or Service. with (no) information/handling cost
3. Present a list of Data per Product group

fields.title: Products without data or requirement
fields.sql:
SELECT
    p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
    p.product_component AS "Component name",      
	p.product_id AS "Product UID",
	p.product_name AS "Product name",
   	count(DISTINCT r.requirement_id) AS "Requirement count",
    count(DISTINCT d.data_id) AS "Data count"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
GROUP BY p.product_copernicus_service, p.product_component, p.product_id, p.product_name
HAVING count(DISTINCT r.requirement_id) = 0 OR count(DISTINCT d.data_id) = 0
ORDER BY p.product_copernicus_service;
fields.description:
Use cases:
 1. List Products without data and/or requirements.

fields.title: Entrusted entity component statistics
fields.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT e.name AS "Entrusted entity",
                c.name AS "Component",

  (SELECT count(r.id)
   FROM insitu_product p
   FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement pr ON pr.product_id = p.id
   FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement r ON pr.requirement_id = r.id
   WHERE p.component_id = c.id
     AND p._deleted = FALSE
     AND r._deleted = FALSE
     AND pr._deleted = FALSE) AS "Count requirements per component",
     
  (SELECT count(p.id)
   FROM insitu_product p
   WHERE p.component_id = c.id
     AND p._deleted = FALSE)
 	 AS "Count products per component",

  (SELECT count(r.id)
   FROM insitu_entrustedentity ee
   FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_component cr ON ee.id = cr.entrusted_entity_id
   FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_product p ON p.component_id = cr.id
   FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement pr ON pr.product_id = p.id
   FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement r ON pr.requirement_id = r.id
   WHERE cr.entrusted_entity_id = e.id
     AND p._deleted = FALSE
     AND r._deleted = FALSE
     AND pr._deleted = FALSE) AS "Count requirements per entrusted entity",

  (SELECT count(p.id)
   FROM insitu_entrustedentity ee
   FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_component cr ON ee.id = cr.entrusted_entity_id
   FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_product p ON p.component_id = cr.id
   FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement pr ON pr.product_id = p.id
   FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement r ON pr.requirement_id = r.id
   WHERE cr.entrusted_entity_id = e.id
     AND p._deleted = FALSE
     AND r._deleted = FALSE
     AND pr._deleted = FALSE) AS "Count products per entrusted entity"

FROM insitu_entrustedentity e
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_component c ON c.entrusted_entity_id = e.id
ORDER BY e.name;
fields.description:
Use cases:
 1. Count Requirements per Entrusted Entity
 2. Count Requirements per Component

fields.title: Data provider statistics
fields.sql:
SELECT dp.name AS "Data provider",
       CASE
           WHEN dp.is_network = TRUE THEN 'Yes'
           ELSE 'No'
       END as "Is network",
       count(d.id) AS "Number of data delivered"
FROM insitu_dataprovider dp
INNER JOIN insitu_dataproviderrelation dpr ON dpr.provider_id = dp.id
INNER JOIN insitu_data d ON dpr.data_id = d.id
WHERE dp._deleted = FALSE
  AND dpr._deleted = FALSE
  AND d._deleted = FALSE
GROUP BY dp.name, dp.is_network
ORDER BY UPPER(dp.name);
fields.description:
Use cases:
 1. List data providers which deliver data and a count of data delivered.

fields.title: Requirement Areas
fields.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT r.requirement_id AS "Requirement UID",
                r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
                p.product_area AS "Area"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
ORDER BY r.requirement_id;
fields.description:
Use cases:
1. List all requirements and their related areas.

fields.title: Data providers per countries
fields.sql:
SELECT 
	   d.data_id AS "Data UID",
       d.data_name AS "Data name",
	   dp.id AS "Data provider UID",
       dp.name AS "Data provider name",
       dp_network.name AS "Data provider network",
       pt.name AS "Provider type",
       c.name AS "Country"
FROM insitu_dataprovider dp
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_networks dpn ON dp.id = dpn.from_dataprovider_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataprovider dp_network ON dp_network.id = dpn.to_dataprovider_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_countries dpc ON dp.id = dpc.dataprovider_id
FULL OUTER JOIN picklists_country c ON c.code = dpc.country_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataproviderdetails dpd ON dp.id = dpd.data_provider_id
FULL OUTER JOIN picklists_providertype pt ON pt.id = dpd.provider_type_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataproviderrelation_view dpr ON dp.id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_provider_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_data_id
ORDER BY UPPER(d.data_name);
fields.description:
Use cases:
1.  List Data Providers for a given Country or Network
2.  List all commercial Data Providers for a given Country or Network (filter by provider type)

fields.title: Products - Requirements -Dataset -Data Providers link
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
       p.product_entrusted_entity AS "Entrusted Entity",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_id AS "Product UID",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_note AS "Product note",
       p.product_area AS "Product area",
       pr.productrequirement_criticality AS "Criticality",
       pr.productrequirement_level_of_definition AS "Level of definition",
       pr.product_relevance AS "Relevance",
       r.requirement_id AS "Requirement UID",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       r.requirement_note AS "Requirement note",
       r.requirement_group AS "Requirement group",
       r.requirement_dissemination AS "Requirement Dissemination",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_breakthrough AS "Requirement Update Frequency Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_goal AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",
       r.requirement_quality_control_procedure AS "Requirement Quality Control Procedure",
       r.requirement_timeliness_threshold AS "Requirement Timeliness Threshold",
       r.requirement_timeliness_breakthrough AS "Requirement Timeliness Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_timeliness_goal AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_goal AS "Requirement Uncertainty Goal",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_owner AS "Requirement Owner",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Information costs",
       dr.datarequirement_handling_costs AS "Handling costs",
       dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance AS "Level of compliance",
       d.data_id AS "Data UID",
       d.data_name AS "Data name",
       dr.datarequirement_note AS "Data link note",
       d.data_area AS "Data area",
       d.data_format AS "Data format",
       d.data_type AS "Data type",
       d.data_update_frequency AS "Data Update Frequency",
       d.data_policy AS "Data Policy",
       d.data_quality_control_procedure AS "Data Quality Control Procedure",
       d.data_timeliness AS "Data Timeliness",
       d.data_start_time_coverage AS "Start time coverage",
       d.data_end_time_coverage AS "End time coverage",
       d.data_dissemination AS "Dissemination",
       d.data_owner AS "Data owner",
       dp.data_provider_id AS "Data provider UID",
       dp.data_provider_name AS "Data provider name",
       dp.data_provider_type AS "Provider type"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataproviderrelation_view dpr ON d.data_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_data_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_without_networks_view dp ON dp.data_provider_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_provider_id
fields.description:
Use cases:
1. List Data Providers per given Product, Component, or Service
2. List all commercial Data Providers contributing to Copernicus per Service (filter by provider type)
3. List Data providers (networks) contributing to Copernicus per Entrusted Entity
4.  List of Service, Product and Component to which a selected Data provider contribute.
5.  List  Data Providers per Product, Component or Service
6.  List Networks and DataProviders delivering data to the selected service/entrusted Entities
7.  List Data Providers deliver essential data to us  (filter by Level of Compliance)

fields.title: Data  - Requirements compliance
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Service name",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_id AS "Product UID",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_area AS "Product area",
       r.requirement_id AS "Requirement UID",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       d.data_id AS "Data UID",
       d.data_name AS "Data name",
       d.data_area AS "Data area",
       dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance AS "Level of Compliance"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
ORDER BY UPPER(p.product_copernicus_service);
fields.description:
Use cases:
1.  List Data fully compliant with Requirements ( filter by Level of compliance)

fields.title: Data report
fields.sql:
SELECT d.data_id AS "Data UID",
	   d.data_name AS "Data name",
       d.data_note AS "Data note",
	   d.data_area AS "Data area",
       d.data_format AS "Data format",
       d.data_policy AS "Data policy",
       d.data_type AS "Data type",
       d.data_timeliness AS "Timeliness",
       d.data_update_frequency AS "Update frequency",
       d.data_quality_control_procedure AS "Quality Control Procedure",
       d.data_dissemination AS "Dissemination",
       d.data_essential_variable AS "Essential variable domain",
       d.data_inspiretheme AS "Inspire theme",
       d.data_start_time_coverage AS "Start time coverage",
       d.data_end_time_coverage AS "End time coverage",
       d.data_state AS "Data state"
FROM insitu_data_view d
ORDER BY UPPER(d.data_name);
fields.description:
Use cases:
1. List INSPIRE themes covered by Data

fields.title: Special report 1
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Copernicus Service name",
       p.product_entrusted_entity AS "Entrusted Entity",
       p.product_component AS "Component name",
       p.product_group AS "Product group",
       p.product_name AS "Product name",
       p.product_note AS "Product note",
       p.product_area AS "Product area",
       p.product_status AS "Product status",
       pr.productrequirement_level_of_definition AS "Product Level of definition",
       pr.product_relevance AS "Product relevance",
       pr.productrequirement_criticality AS "Product Criticality",
       pr.productrequirement_barrier AS "Product Barriers",
       pr.productrequirement_note AS "Product Note of linked Requirement",
	   r.requirement_group AS "Requirement group",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       r.requirement_note AS "Requirement note",
       r.requirement_state AS "Requirement state",
       r.requirement_owner AS "Requirement owner (created by)",
       r.requirement_dissemination AS "Requirement dissemination",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_breakthrough AS "Requirement Update Frequency Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_goal AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",
       r.requirement_quality_control_procedure AS "Requirement Quality Control Procedure",
       r.requirement_timeliness_threshold AS "Requirement Timeliness Threshold",
       r.requirement_timeliness_breakthrough AS "Requirement Timeliness Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_timeliness_goal AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_goal AS "Requirement Uncertainty Goal",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Goal",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Threshold",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance AS "Requirement level of compliance of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Requirement Data Information costs of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Requirement Data Handling costs of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_note AS "Requirement Note of linked Dataset",
       d.data_name AS "Data name",
       d.data_note AS "Data note",
       dp.data_provider_name AS "Data provider name",
       dp.data_provider_type AS "Data provider type name",
       dp.data_provider_country AS "Data provider country",
       dp.data_provider_network_name AS "Data provider network",
       d.data_area AS "Data area",
       d.data_type AS "Data type",
       d.data_format AS "Data format",
       d.data_policy AS "Data Policy",
       d.data_update_frequency AS "Data Update Frequency",
       d.data_state AS "Data State",
       dp.data_provider_state AS "Data provider state",
       d.data_owner AS "Data owner",
       d.data_created_at AS "Data created ",
       d.data_updated_at AS "Data updated",
       d.data_timeliness AS "Data timeliness",
       d.data_start_time_coverage AS "Data Start time coverage",
       d.data_end_time_coverage AS "Data End time coverage",
       d.data_quality_control_procedure AS "Data Quality Control Procedure",
       d.data_dissemination AS "Data Dissemination",
       d.data_inspiretheme AS "Data INSPIRE Theme Name",
       d.data_essential_variable AS "Data Essential Variable"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataproviderrelation_view dpr ON d.data_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_data_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_view dp ON dp.data_provider_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_provider_id
WHERE p.product_copernicus_service IN ('Copernicus Emergency Management Service', 'Copernicus Land Monitoring Service', 'Copernicus Security Service');
fields.description:
1.This report contains all relevant columns from products, requirements, data and data requirements for the following services:
    a) Copernicus Emergency Management Service
    b) Copernicus Land Monitoring Service
    c) Copernicus Security Service

fields.title: Special report 2
fields.sql:
SELECT p.product_copernicus_service AS "Copernicus Service name",
       p.product_entrusted_entity AS "Entrusted Entity",

	   r.requirement_group AS "Requirement group",
       r.requirement_name AS "Requirement name",
       r.requirement_note AS "Requirement note",
       r.requirement_state AS "Requirement state",
       r.requirement_owner AS "Requirement owner (created by)",
       r.requirement_dissemination AS "Requirement dissemination",
       r.requirement_update_frequency_threshold AS "Requirement Update Frequency Threshold",

       r.requirement_update_frequency_goal AS "Requirement Update Frequency Goal",

       r.requirement_timeliness_goal AS "Requirement Timeliness Goal",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_threshold AS "Requirement Uncertainty Threshold",
       r.requirement_uncertainty_breakthrough AS "Requirement Uncertainty Breakthrough",

       r.requirement_horizontal_resolution_threshold AS "Requirement Horizontal Resolution Threshold",

       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_breakthrough AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Breakthrough",
       r.requirement_vertical_resolution_goal AS "Requirement Vertical Resolution Goal",
       dr.datarequirement_level_of_compliance AS "Requirement level of compliance of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Requirement Data Information costs of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_information_costs AS "Requirement Data Handling costs of linked Dataset",
       dr.datarequirement_note AS "Requirement Note of linked Dataset",
       d.data_name AS "Data name",
       d.data_note AS "Data note",
       dp.data_provider_name AS "Data provider name",
       dp.data_provider_type AS "Data provider type name",
       dp.data_provider_country AS "Data provider country",
       dp.data_provider_network_name AS "Data provider network",
       d.data_area AS "Data area",
       d.data_type AS "Data type",
       d.data_format AS "Data format",
       d.data_policy AS "Data Policy",
       d.data_update_frequency AS "Data Update Frequency",
       d.data_state AS "Data State",
       dp.data_provider_state AS "Data provider state",
       d.data_owner AS "Data owner",
       d.data_created_at AS "Data created ",
       d.data_updated_at AS "Data updated",
       d.data_timeliness AS "Data timeliness",
       d.data_start_time_coverage AS "Data Start time coverage",
       d.data_end_time_coverage AS "Data End time coverage",
       d.data_quality_control_procedure AS "Data Quality Control Procedure",
       d.data_dissemination AS "Data Dissemination",
       d.data_inspiretheme AS "Data INSPIRE Theme Name",
       d.data_essential_variable AS "Data Essential Variable"
FROM insitu_product_view p
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_productrequirement_view pr ON p.product_id = pr.productrequirement_product_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_requirement_view r ON r.requirement_id = pr.productrequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_datarequirement_view dr ON r.requirement_id = dr.datarequirement_requirement_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_data_view d ON d.data_id = dr.datarequirement_data_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataproviderrelation_view dpr ON d.data_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_data_id
FULL OUTER JOIN insitu_dataprovider_view dp ON dp.data_provider_id = dpr.dataproviderrelation_provider_id
WHERE p.product_copernicus_service IN ('Copernicus Marine Environment Monitoring Service', 'Copernicus Climate Change Service', 'Copernicus Atmosphere Monitoring Service');
fields.description:
1.This report contains all relevant columns from products, requirements, data and data requirements for the following services:
    a) Copernicus Emergency Management Service
    b) Copernicus Land Monitoring Service
    c) Copernicus Security Service
